name: It'll All Be Ok
description:
RIP cats

featuring CRUISR - All Over (Bear//Face Remix) https://soundcloud.com/cruisr/cruisr-all-over-bear-face-remix

"It lasts roughly five min­utes, and yet it man­ages to present the strong theme of the loss of a loved one in a fresh and extremely touch­ing fash­ion." — Ind­ie­Games

"oh and look up there, it's Jesus with a kitty's head." — PC Gamer

"It'll All Be Ok, a touch­ing Music Video(game) about grief … show­cases the power of this new genre in a mere 5 min­utes." — The Arcadeist

Fea­tured on Warp­door

Game 68 of 100 in 5 years
